data: stella
stella
You must defeat this fist to stand a chance.
I can't believe we both lost...
Who taught you to block$with your face?
Looks like we both need practice...
I can't keep beating$you up like this.
Let's just say we're both winners.
Call an ambulance!$But not for me!
We need to settle this soon!
You call that a fight?
Hope we get a fight of the night bonus!
sky

Back to the drawing board...
I hope your coach didn't bet on you.

You can never win against me.
There will be a winner next time!
Stupid people can believe in anything, so you can believe in yourself
